feed.title: Wizarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.2b
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

Please remove user: UID:GID from docker declaration. Instead use environment variables, as such:

```yaml

services: wizarr: container_name: wizarr image: ghcr.io/wizarrrr/wizarr ports: - 5690:5690 volumes: - /path/to/appdata/config/database:/data/database - /path/to/appdata/config/wizard:/data/wizard_steps environment: - PUID=1000 #Set UID - PGID=1000 #Set GID - DISABLE_BUILTIN_AUTH=false #Set to true ONLY if you are using another auth provider (Authelia, Authentik, etc) - TZ=Europe/London #Set your timezone here or CLI:bash docker run -d \ --name wizarr \ -e DISABLE_BUILTIN_AUTH=false \ -e PUID=1000 -e PGID=1000 \ -e TZ=Europe/London \ -p 5690:5690 \ -v /path/to/appdata/config/database:/data/database \ -v /path/to/appdata/config/wizard:/data/wizard_steps --restart unless-stopped \ ghcr.io/wizarrrr/wizarr ```

What's Changed

  • Fix tailwind button to use cursor: pointer by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/582
  • Increase default generated CODESIZE; increase maximum custom codesize by @vhsdream in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/589
  • Create user/group at runtime in docker-entrypoint.sh by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/594
  • Bump boto3 from 1.38.29 to 1.38.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/598
  • Change password to not have limit by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/597
  • Updated development.md by @Krytos in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/595

New Contributors

  • @vhsdream made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/589
  • @Krytos made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/595

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.6.2...2025.6.2b

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix tailwind button to use cursor: pointer by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/582
  • Increase default generated CODESIZE; increase maximum custom codesize by @vhsdream in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/589
  • Create user/group at runtime in docker-entrypoint.sh by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/594
  • Bump boto3 from 1.38.29 to 1.38.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/598
  • Change password to not have limit by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/597
  • Updated development.md by @Krytos in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/595
  • Add AGENTS guidelines by @mtthidoteu in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/600
  • Untrack .mo files in repository by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/610
  • Fix group/user error group 'wizarrgroup' in use (#603) by @wraith15 in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/608
  • Add dev.py file that greatly simplifies development by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/606
  • Fix settings page not loading when using reverse proxy with https by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/602
  • Content scrolling improvements so that support footer doesn't overlap by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/604
  • Server URL error handling improvements by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/605

New Contributors

  • @vhsdream made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/589
  • @Krytos made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/595
  • @wraith15 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.6.2...2025.6.3

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.3b
entry.content:
Fixed

Unraid GID issue

What's Changed

  • Restrict wizard access by @mtthidoteu in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/612
  • Code placeholder now shows example with correct length by @fireph in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.6.3...2025.6.3b

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.4
entry.content:
What's New in Wizarr 2025.6.4

This update brings some big improvements and helpful fixes! ‚ú® Features & Improvements

  • Multiple Server Support & Identity Linking ‚Äì You can now manage multiple media servers directly within Wizarr! üéâ
  • Wizard Access Restriction ‚Äì Admins can now control who has access to the setup wizard.
  • Smarter Code Placeholder ‚Äì Example codes now show with the correct character length.
  • Translated Server Errors ‚Äì Error messages now support translations for better clarity across languages.
  • Better Ownership Handling ‚Äì chown now runs reliably for all users during setup.
  • General bug fixes

üõ† Dependency Updates

  • Tailwind CSS & CLI bumped to 4.1.10
  • requests updated to 2.32.4
  • boto3 updated to 1.38.36

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.5
entry.content:
üéâ What‚Äôs New in Wizarr 2025.6.5

This release brings some exciting enhancements, a brand-new UI feature, and a bunch of behind-the-scenes improvements!

‚ú® New Features

  • üßô Editable Wizard UI: You can now manage wizard steps directly from the interface ‚Äì add, edit, reorder, or delete steps with ease.
  • üì¶ ROMM Support Added: Wizarr now plays nicely with [ROMM](https://github.com/rommapp/romm), making retro game library integration smoother than ever.

üõ† Improvements & Fixes

  • üß† Fixed API issues with Jellyfin/Emby where parameters weren't passed correctly.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Improved asset build system for a faster, more reliable setup.
  • ü™≤ General bug fixes and performance tweaks to keep things running smoothly.

üì¶ Dependency Updates

  • HTMX updated to 2.0.5 for better frontend performance.
  • Markdown, Boto3, and Cachetools bumped to their latest stable versions for security and stability.

üëã New Contributors

  • Big thanks to @techfahter and @arch1eOS for their first contributions!
